events.title: St Maur vs Lille - French Cup - 2025/26 - Round of 32
events.desc: Live and exclusive only on beIN, the Coupe de France, also referred to as the French Cup, is the premier knockout cup competition in French football organised by the French Football Federation (FF). The winner qualifies for the group stage of the UEFA Europa League and a place in the Trophée des Champions. Current champions are Paris saint Germain.

events.title: Al Shorta (IRQ) vs Al Sadd SC (QAT) - AFC Champions League Elite 2025/2026 - West MD1
events.desc: This will be the first ever AFC Champions League Elite meeting between Al Shorta and Al Sadd; Iraqi teams have won five of their last seven matches against Qatari sides in the competition, after winning just one of the first seven. Al Shorta failed to win any of their first three matches against Qatari teams in the competition  and did not score in those games, but they won their last such meeting 2-1 vs Al Duhail in April 2021.

events.title: Villarreal vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 17 - Mini Match
events.desc: Real Sociedad have lost two of their last three LaLiga matches against Sevilla, after having not lost any of their previous five against the Sevillians in the competition. Sevilla have lost two of their last three visits to Real Sociedad in LaLiga, although their last away league win against them came in March 2025. They have not won two consecutive away LaLiga matches against Real Sociedad since 2011.
